name: galactic-commander
description: Galactic Commanders: Explore & Conquer game monorepo
author: Daniel Somoza <dasomoza@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn workspace game-engine build && yarn workspace auth-microservice build && yarn workspace game-api-microservice build && yarn workspace frontend build
scripts.precoverage: yarn workspaces run test:coverage && nyc merge packages/auth-microservice/coverage coverage-temp/auth-microservice.json && nyc merge packages/game-engine/coverage coverage-temp/game-engine.json && nyc merge packages/game-api-microservice/coverage coverage-temp/game-api-microservice.json && nyc merge packages/frontend/coverage coverage-temp/frontend.json
